name: XCTPerformanceMeasurement.Polarity
desc: Constants that state whether larger or smaller measurements, relative to a set baseline, indicate better performance.

items.name: case prefersLarger
items.desc: A performance measurement where a larger value, relative to a set baseline, indicates better performance.

items.name: case prefersSmaller
items.desc: A performance measurement where a smaller value, relative to a set baseline, indicates better performance.

items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: A performance measurement that doesnâ€™t specify whether a larger or smaller value, relative to a set baseline, indicates better performance.
